title: 15 Best Memorial Day Outdoor Furniture Sales 2025, Vetted By AD's Editors
description: Celebrate the long weekend with discounts on outdoor sofas, pool loungers, rugs, and more
author: Nashia Baker, Audrey Lee
excerpt: Scoop up these Memorial Day outdoor furniture sales so those loungers will be right on time for the next BBQ.
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.As the weather turns to its sunnier side, the best Memorial Day outdoor furniture sales are exactly what you'll need to welcome better weather. Alfresco hosting season is just about to ramp up—meaning the time to seriously contemplate your outdoor patio furniture needs is now. Since bringing your current assortment out of hibernation, you might notice that your outdoor furniture could use a refresh. (This is especially true if you live in a colder climate and leave your outdoor seating out in the elements—even acacia wood can crack if you leave a chair set sitting in the snow.)Luckily, you can save as much 70% off from the best outdoor furniture stores during Memorial Day sale promotions. What types of items are on sale, you ask? Patio umbrellas, dining sets, sofas, and daybeds are all in the mix. Even essentials like fire pits and weather-resistant furniture covers are marked down. Without further ado, scroll below to find the best outdoor furniture sales and get a head start on revamping your backyard oasis.Our Top Picks:Best Dining Table: Article Latta Outdoor Dining Table, $749 $449Best Sectional: Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional Sofa, $9,949 $7,957Best Coffee Table: Outer Teak Outdoor Coffee Table, $625 $1,250Best Dining Set: Burrow Dunes Teak Dining Set, $3,089 $3,168Best Outdoor Pillow: Lovett Outdoor Pillow by Sarah Sherman Samuel, $98 $78Crate & Barrel: Up to 70% OffDuring Crate & Barrel’s sale, you can score outdoor furniture for up to 70% off on clearance items to outfit your space (note that some are Final Sale), and up to 30% off regular-priced outdoor items. Another brand with contemporary, traditional picks, you’ll find nature-inspired seating like outdoor teak sectionals. Plus, picks with functionality like a kitchen island that can double as an outdoor bar. What’s more, you can double your rewards with outdoor furniture purchases.Crate & Barrell Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional SofaCrate & Barrel Bari Green Metal Stackable Outdoor Dining Chair with CushionOuter: 20% Sitewide, Up To 50% on Discontinued ItemsThanks to their sustainably made furniture and ease of delivery and assembly, Outer has long been an AD-favorite outdoor furniture brand. From dining sets that can seat up to eight to their new Adirondack and matching ottoman and furniture covers, you can nab everything you need to kick off the outdoor living season. Outer even includes the bug-repellent throws in their spring sale for when the pesky mosquitoes make their debut. For Memorial Day the brand is offering a rare 20% off everything—making it an excellent time to invest in a outdoor sofa or splurge on a full seating system. Deal hunters can also save up to 50% on discontinued items, like the brand's teak outdoor coffee table. Sale ends June 2.Outer Teak Outdoor Sofa & ArmchairsOuter Teak Outdoor Coffee TableBurrow: 25% Off Sitewide Plus Free ShippingBurrow is the place to go when you’re looking for modular pieces that need to fit into tricky places—say, a rooftop patio above the sunroom. The midcentury style of the Dunes collection is right up our alley when it comes to lounging (or even using it as a WFH perch). Made with FSC-certified teak that has a dense structure and higher concentration of oils, the seating set is bound to last for years with proper care. (Cue the teak cleaner kit to keep it turning from golden into silvery gray.) The upholstery is quick-drying and won’t absorb dirt and accidental spills. Our favorite part? Assembly is a cinch. Plus, you’ll get free shipping on orders over $2,000.Burrow Dunes Teak Dining SetBurrow Dunes Teak 6-Piece SectionalAmazon: Up to 60% OffHidden in Amazon’s many categories is its outdoor collection with up to 60% off must-haves like Adirondack chairs, outdoor dining sets, and coastal love seats. Even as the weather warms up, an outdoor living space is hardly complete without heaters or fire pits to keep you cozy during the chillier early spring months. When it comes to the latter, this tiki fire pit offers a smokeless design and a durable metal frame built to last.OutVue Wood Burning Fire Pits with Grill & LidPamapic 5-Piece Patio Dining SetSerena & Lily: Up to 70% Off Plus Free Shipping on ClearanceWelcome coastal chic design to your outdoor space with Serena & Lily. We love the new colors for the Riviera dining chairs—from Coastal Blue to Lobster—and the brand’s for its beach-inspired furniture and outdoor decor. Anyone in the market for a great-looking outdoor sofa will want to check out the Pacifica sofa that our reviewer Blake says “has held up so well after three years.” Maximalists will definitely want to pick up the Perennials Awning Del Mar Coffee Table while it's still available, currently at more than 50% off (originally over $2,000, it might be too long). If your outdoor space isn't sectional-friendly, we recommend checking out the Haven sofa for a similar look. Add a couple of brand's Low chairs to create a bespoke conversation set you'll use all summer long.Neighbor Haven SofaNeighbor Low ChairLulu and Georgia: Up to 50% Off SitewideThe hotspot for designer collaborations and curated collections announced 20% sitewide to celebrate Memorial Day with deeper discounts to be found in its official clearance section. Peruse the outdoor categories for delicious deals on outdoor furniture and decor, like the Lovett pillow that’s a must to spruce up conversation sets, and a modern Sarah Sherman Samuel-designed coffee table that can also be an indoor piece. Indoor/outdoor rugs are also includes in the sale—and just picture how great the a coordinating Lovett rug will look beneath a dining table. The styles are ideal for those who want to seamlessly merge their indoor style alfresco. Just glimpse their best-selling Jasper Collection that now has water-resistant outdoor upholstery, quick-dry foam cushions, and a teak base. The new Riva collection is on sale, too. We love how the weather-resistant teak wood frame sets it apart from most outdoor furniture silhouettes. Even if you’re not sure which colorway to choose from, just request free swatch samples. The brand carries both performance outdoor fabrics and those from Sunbrella.Interior Define Jasper Outdoor Corner Sectional SofaInterior Define Riva Outdoor OttomanWayfair: Up to 60% OffWayfair is a key destination for some of the biggest furniture sales you’ll find year-round (like the aptly named Way Day that takes place in May), but the brand’s daily sales page isn’t one to overlook. You’ll find outdoor bestsellers like rattan bistro sets and whimsical outdoor umbrellas up to 60% off right now.Winston Porter 6-Person Extendable Outdoor Dining SetJoss & Main Market SunbrellaDesign Within Reach: Up to 30% Off Plus Free ShippingIf you want to create a high-end, design-forward patio space, look no further than Design Within Reach. (Think teak lounge chairs with an included end table and wicker dining table sets.) For the brand's Memorial Day sale, snag up to $500 off sitewide.Castlery Rio Outdoor Sofa, 2 Lounge Chairs & Table SetCastlery Rio Outdoor OttomanWest Elm: Up to 60% Off, Extra 20% Off ClearanceFor a contemporary (and accessible) approach to your outdoor furniture, don’t skip West Elm’s offerings this Memorial Day. At this moment, you can take advantage of the brand’s outdoor furniture sale for 60% off au courant furniture and decor, like a full conversation set or an expandable dining table to host upcoming backyard functions.West Elm Portside Outdoor SofaWest Elm Hargrove Outdoor Expandable Dining TableCB2: Up to 60% OffA modern spin on items you’ll see at Crate & Barrel, sister site CB2 also includes up to 30% off spring layers, up to 60% markdowns, and double rewards on select outdoor pieces. Yardbird makes finding investment-worthy outdoor pieces easier, thanks to its collections of customizable furniture and decor. For Memorial Day, the brand is offering 25% off order $2,500 and up, meaning it's worth splurging on larger sets and multiple items. html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

As the weather turns to its sunnier side, the best Memorial Day outdoor furniture sales are exactly what you'll need to welcome better weather. Alfresco hosting season is just about to ramp up—meaning the time to seriously contemplate your outdoor patio furniture needs is now. Since bringing your current assortment out of hibernation, you might notice that your outdoor furniture could use a refresh. (This is especially true if you live in a colder climate and leave your outdoor seating out in the elements—even acacia wood can crack if you leave a chair set sitting in the snow.)

Luckily, you can save as much 70% off from the best outdoor furniture stores during Memorial Day sale promotions. What types of items are on sale, you ask? Patio umbrellas, dining sets, sofas, and daybeds are all in the mix. Even essentials like fire pits and weather-resistant furniture covers are marked down. Without further ado, scroll below to find the best outdoor furniture sales and get a head start on revamping your backyard oasis.

Our Top Picks:

  • Best Dining Table: Article Latta Outdoor Dining Table, $749 $449
  • Best Sectional: Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional Sofa, $9,949 $7,957
  • Best Coffee Table: Outer Teak Outdoor Coffee Table, $625 $1,250
  • Best Dining Set: Burrow Dunes Teak Dining Set, $3,089 $3,168
  • Best Outdoor Pillow: Lovett Outdoor Pillow by Sarah Sherman Samuel, $98 $78

Crate & Barrel: Up to 70% Off

During Crate & Barrel’s sale, you can score outdoor furniture for up to 70% off on clearance items to outfit your space (note that some are Final Sale), and up to 30% off regular-priced outdoor items. Another brand with contemporary, traditional picks, you’ll find nature-inspired seating like outdoor teak sectionals. Plus, picks with functionality like a kitchen island that can double as an outdoor bar. What’s more, you can double your rewards with outdoor furniture purchases.

Crate & Barrell Batten Teak L-Shaped Outdoor Sectional Sofa

Crate & Barrel Bari Green Metal Stackable Outdoor Dining Chair with Cushion

Outer: 20% Sitewide, Up To 50% on Discontinued Items

Thanks to their sustainably made furniture and ease of delivery and assembly, Outer has long been an AD-favorite outdoor furniture brand. From dining sets that can seat up to eight to their new Adirondack and matching ottoman and furniture covers, you can nab everything you need to kick off the outdoor living season. Outer even includes the bug-repellent throws in their spring sale for when the pesky mosquitoes make their debut. For Memorial Day the brand is offering a rare 20% off everything—making it an excellent time to invest in a outdoor sofa or splurge on a full seating system. Deal hunters can also save up to 50% on discontinued items, like the brand's teak outdoor coffee table. Sale ends June 2.

Outer Teak Outdoor Sofa & Armchairs

Outer Teak Outdoor Coffee Table

Burrow: 25% Off Sitewide Plus Free Shipping

Burrow is the place to go when you’re looking for modular pieces that need to fit into tricky places—say, a rooftop patio above the sunroom. The midcentury style of the Dunes collection is right up our alley when it comes to lounging (or even using it as a WFH perch). Made with FSC-certified teak that has a dense structure and higher concentration of oils, the seating set is bound to last for years with proper care. (Cue the teak cleaner kit to keep it turning from golden into silvery gray.) The upholstery is quick-drying and won’t absorb dirt and accidental spills. Our favorite part? Assembly is a cinch. Plus, you’ll get free shipping on orders over $2,000.

Burrow Dunes Teak Dining Set

Burrow Dunes Teak 6-Piece Sectional

Amazon: Up to 60% Off

Hidden in Amazon’s many categories is its outdoor collection with up to 60% off must-haves like Adirondack chairs, outdoor dining sets, and coastal love seats. Even as the weather warms up, an outdoor living space is hardly complete without heaters or fire pits to keep you cozy during the chillier early spring months. When it comes to the latter, this tiki fire pit offers a smokeless design and a durable metal frame built to last.

OutVue Wood Burning Fire Pits with Grill & Lid

Pamapic 5-Piece Patio Dining Set

Serena & Lily: Up to 70% Off Plus Free Shipping on Clearance

Welcome coastal chic design to your outdoor space with Serena & Lily. We love the new colors for the Riviera dining chairs—from Coastal Blue to Lobster—and the brand’s for its beach-inspired furniture and outdoor decor. Anyone in the market for a great-looking outdoor sofa will want to check out the Pacifica sofa that our reviewer Blake says “has held up so well after three years.” Maximalists will definitely want to pick up the Perennials Awning Del Mar Coffee Table while it's still available, currently at more than 50% off (originally over $2,000, it might be too long). Sale ends May 28.

Serena & Lily Pacifica Sofa

Serena & Lily Del Mar Coffee Table

Article: Up to 40% Off

Hundreds of items are on sale at Article as we speak—like this fashionable outdoor sectional with netted armrests and a dining table that would also look great sitting in your kitchen. Not only are they one of our favorite retailers for outdoor furniture, they've got stellar living and dining room seating to boot—like the Sven sectional commerce editor Audrey tested in our very first Seat Week.

Article Latta Outdoor Dining Table

Article Callais Outdoor Sectional

Neighbor: 15% Off Orders

AD100 designer Mandy Cheng told us “Neighbor’s roundabout sectional is one of [her] favorites when clients want a non-white sofa (which is everyone).” For Memorial Day you can snag 15% off Cheng's pick as well as everything else from the brand using code MD2025. If your outdoor space isn't sectional-friendly, we recommend checking out the Haven sofa for a similar look. Add a couple of brand's Low chairs to create a bespoke conversation set you'll use all summer long.

Neighbor Haven Sofa

Neighbor Low Chair

Lulu and Georgia: Up to 50% Off Sitewide

The hotspot for designer collaborations and curated collections announced 20% sitewide to celebrate Memorial Day with deeper discounts to be found in its official clearance section. Peruse the outdoor categories for delicious deals on outdoor furniture and decor, like the Lovett pillow that’s a must to spruce up conversation sets, and a modern Sarah Sherman Samuel-designed coffee table that can also be an indoor piece. Indoor/outdoor rugs are also includes in the sale—and just picture how great the a coordinating Lovett rug will look beneath a dining table. Sale ends May 27.

Scalloped Indoor / Outdoor Coffee Table by Sarah Sherman Samuel

Lovett Indoor / Outdoor Pillow by Sarah Sherman Samuel

Interior Define: 25% Off Custom Furniture

We love Interior Define for its customizable approach. The styles are ideal for those who want to seamlessly merge their indoor style alfresco. Just glimpse their best-selling Jasper Collection that now has water-resistant outdoor upholstery, quick-dry foam cushions, and a teak base. The new Riva collection is on sale, too. We love how the weather-resistant teak wood frame sets it apart from most outdoor furniture silhouettes. Even if you’re not sure which colorway to choose from, just request free swatch samples. The brand carries both performance outdoor fabrics and those from Sunbrella.

Interior Define Jasper Outdoor Corner Sectional Sofa

Interior Define Riva Outdoor Ottoman

Wayfair: Up to 60% Off

Wayfair is a key destination for some of the biggest furniture sales you’ll find year-round (like the aptly named Way Day that takes place in May), but the brand’s daily sales page isn’t one to overlook. You’ll find outdoor bestsellers like rattan bistro sets and whimsical outdoor umbrellas up to 60% off right now.

Winston Porter 6-Person Extendable Outdoor Dining Set

Joss & Main Market Sunbrella

Design Within Reach: Up to 30% Off Plus Free Shipping

If you want to create a high-end, design-forward patio space, look no further than Design Within Reach. Save big and add a sophisticated touch to your home’s exteriors with up to 50% off sale items and free shipping on purchases over $2,000. Pull out your credit card to shop our favorite finds like the stylish outdoor lounge chair to relax poolside as the sun peeks from behind the clouds.

Design Within Reach Terassi Lounge Chair

Design Within Reach Terassi Chaise

Castlery: Up to $500 Off

Calling all minimalists: Castlery brings an elevated, cozy feel to the outdoors with clean lines and weather-resistant materials. (Think teak lounge chairs with an included end table and wicker dining table sets.) For the brand's Memorial Day sale, snag up to $500 off sitewide.

Castlery Rio Outdoor Sofa, 2 Lounge Chairs & Table Set

Castlery Rio Outdoor Ottoman

West Elm: Up to 60% Off, Extra 20% Off Clearance

For a contemporary (and accessible) approach to your outdoor furniture, don’t skip West Elm’s offerings this Memorial Day. At this moment, you can take advantage of the brand’s outdoor furniture sale for 60% off au courant furniture and decor, like a full conversation set or an expandable dining table to host upcoming backyard functions.

West Elm Portside Outdoor Sofa

West Elm Hargrove Outdoor Expandable Dining Table

CB2: Up to 60% Off

A modern spin on items you’ll see at Crate & Barrel, sister site CB2 also includes up to 30% off spring layers, up to 60% markdowns, and double rewards on select outdoor pieces. We’re eyeing the brand’s collection of unique armchairs and teak planters to incorporate in any avant-garde outdoor area ahead of Memorial Day.

Cascata Twisted Indoor/Outdoor Planter by Mermelada Estudio

CB2 Cabra Teak Outdoor Corner Chair

Yardbird: 25% Off Orders $2,500+

Finding ways to fill up patio space can be surprisingly difficult—and it’s easy to opt for something you less than love. Yardbird makes finding investment-worthy outdoor pieces easier, thanks to its collections of customizable furniture and decor. For Memorial Day, the brand is offering 25% off order $2,500 and up, meaning it's worth splurging on larger sets and multiple items. Shoppers looking to get even more bang for their buck can also head to the site's Last Call section, where certain styles are discounted up to 60% off.

Yardbird Colby Loveseat Set

Yardbird Ludlow Small Sectional Set
